backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining AC submission backend with validation, duplicate detection, and authenticated admin queries for submissions and customer contacts; stores submissions in a Map keyed by brand+model+customerName.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four error handling and logging improvements across frontend components (ACSubmissionForm, Admin page, ErrorBoundary, and network handling in hooks).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling with emphasis on error handling, authentication flows, and contact information display.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining warm earth tone design tokens for light and dark modes, including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AC Buy application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (home, submit, success, pricing, contact, admin), QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and Toaster; defines HistoryState interface for navigation state.
frontend/src/components/ACSubmissionForm: AC submission form with comprehensive validation, error classification by type (network, timeout, validation, duplicate), detailed console logging throughout submission flow, and conditional error UI with icons and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Reusable card component displaying four contact detail sections (phone, email, address, business hours) with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors, displays error details with stack traces in a card UI, and provides a retry button to reset the error state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with navigation, mobile menu, and Internet Identity authentication integration that handles login/logout flows and redirects to admin dashboard after successful authentication.
frontend/src/components/PricingCalculato: Interactive pricing calculator component that displays estimated AC buyback prices based on age/condition selection (2-3 years, 3-5 years, or dead/non-functional) with formatted INR currency display.
frontend/src/components/PricingFactorCar: Reusable card component that displays a pricing factor with an icon, title, and description, supporting both Lucide icons and custom image sources.
frontend/src/hooks/useACSubmission.ts: Custom hook that manages AC submission form data to the backend canister, handling loading states, error messages, and detailed logging for network/timeout/backend errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query-based hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching submissions data from the backend actor, including useGetAllSubmissions and useGetSubmission with comprehensive error handling, logging, and retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-toned color palette for both light and dark modes, including primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all AC submissions in a table format, requires Internet Identity authentication, and includes condition formatting helpers and error handling with retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company contact information, multiple communication channels, and an FAQ section about the AC buying process, pickup services, and accepted brands.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards highlighting competitive pricing and eco-friendly service, and a 'How It Works' section explaining the AC selling process.
frontend/src/pages/PricingInfo.tsx: Pricing information page explaining factors that affect AC valuation (age, condition, brand, efficiency, market demand) with a pricing calculator component and example pricing tiers.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccess.tsx: Success page displayed after AC submission form completion, showing customer contact details and next steps with owner phone numbers for direct contact.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitAC.tsx: AC submission page that renders the ACSubmissionForm component with introductory text and feature cards highlighting quick response, no obligation, and secure process.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter font, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, known issues (quote form submission error and admin contact details error), and architectural notes about unauthenticated admin dashboard access.
